original_body_lines: General Information Technology (GIT) Examination for four years starting from 2019 will be held today (18), the Examinations Department Commissioner General said.
Accordingly, the GIT exam relating to 2019, 2020, 2021 and 2023 will be held on March 18, he said. The examination will start at 9.00 am until 12.10 pm in the day.
He said a total of 517,676 candidates will sit for the examination at 3,269 examination centres. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
